review: The Amazon Fire Stick far exceeded my expectations. The video quality is phenomenal as well as the sound. There are so many apps for this it is ridiculous. If you look it up there are tons of ways to get much more out of this unit than meets the eye. All in all this unit pays for itself in a single day, go for it you'll be glad you did.
author: Darius Phiffer

review: Great product. Buying the SLING subscription gave me over $120 a month vs cable. I would highly recommend to anyone who wants quality TV without the price of cable or satellite
author: lcbpapa

review: Live that I did not have to buy a smart tv to have all that the fire stick offers with a great price.
author: Sandra

review: works great and is alot sasier to connect to my slingbox app
author: John Hoermann

review: Great device for the money. Does it exactly what is advertised.
author: Brian White
